mapper.sql: Priadetails_id, Priabill_id, Priabill_price, Priabill_type, Priabill_number, Priabill_remarks, Priabill_Auditing, Priabill_yn, Priabill_custom1, Priabill_custom2, Priabill_custom3, Priabill_custom4, Priabill_custom5, Priabill_custom6, Priabill_custom7, Priabill_custom8, Priabill_custom9, Priabill_custom10
mapper.select:
select
from priadetails where Priabill_yn=0 ORDER BY Priadetails_id DESC

SELECT priadetails.Priadetails_id,priadetails.Priabill_id,priadetails.Priabill_price,priadetails.Priabill_type, priadetails.Priabill_number,priadetails.Priabill_remarks, priadetails.Priabill_Auditing,priadetails.Priabill_yn,priadetails.Priabill_custom1,priadetails.Priabill_custom2, priadetails.Priabill_custom3, priadetails.Priabill_custom4,priadetails.Priabill_custom5, priadetails.Priabill_custom6,priadetails.Priabill_custom7,priadetails.Priabill_custom8,priadetails.Priabill_custom9, priadetails.Priabill_custom10 FROM priadetails,priabill WHERE priabill.priabill_yn=0 AND priabill.priabill_supplier_name=#{priabillCustom10,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND priadetails.Priabill_id=priabill.priabill_id AND priabill.`priabill_Auditing`=1 AND priadetails.Priabill_custom6 is null ORDER BY priadetails.Priadetails_id DESC

SELECT priadetails.Priadetails_id,priadetails.Priabill_id,priadetails.Priabill_price,priadetails.Priabill_type, priadetails.Priabill_number,priadetails.Priabill_remarks, priadetails.Priabill_Auditing,priadetails.Priabill_yn,priadetails.Priabill_custom1,priadetails.Priabill_custom2, priadetails.Priabill_custom3, priadetails.Priabill_custom4,priadetails.Priabill_custom5, priadetails.Priabill_custom6,priadetails.Priabill_custom7,priadetails.Priabill_custom8,priadetails.Priabill_custom9, priadetails.Priabill_custom10 FROM priadetails,priabill WHERE priabill.priabill_yn=0 AND priabill.priabill_supplier_name=#{priabillCustom10,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND priadetails.Priabill_id=priabill.priabill_id AND priabill.`priabill_Auditing`=1 AND priadetails.Priabill_custom6 = '1' ORDER BY priadetails.Priadetails_id DESC

SELECT priadetails.Priadetails_id,priadetails.Priabill_id,priadetails.Priabill_price, priadetails.Priabill_type,priadetails.Priabill_number,priadetails.Priabill_remarks, priadetails.Priabill_Auditing,priadetails.Priabill_yn,priadetails.Priabill_custom1, priadetails.Priabill_custom2,priadetails.Priabill_custom3,priadetails.Priabill_custom4, priadetails.Priabill_custom5,priadetails.Priabill_custom6,priadetails.Priabill_custom7, priadetails.Priabill_custom8,priadetails.Priabill_custom9,priadetails.Priabill_custom10 FROM priadetails WHERE priadetails.Priabill_id=#{priabillId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND priadetails.Priabill_yn=0 ORDER BY priadetails.Priadetails_id DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM priadetails WHERE Priabill_yn=0
